overview:
Travis Simpson is the founder and Chief Content Officer at Symbolscape Media. He is formally trained as a writer, editor and documentary filmmaker and believes very strongly that reality is best manipulated at the point of its reception rather than in the field. Travis lives in Fremont, California, where he writes and produces content about media, culture, business and society.

Symbolscape Media is a digital services firm located in the heart of Silicon Valley in the San Francisco Bay Area. We create digital products that enable companies to assert a substantial presence in the online world. We present experience and expertise in all facets of content marketing, from broadcast quality IPTV programming to traditional web video production and contemporary web design as well as social media strategies.
